data.message: i expected to be seeing people say hes the best rapper ever but thats not the case, you got people saying hes the best white rapper when that isnt the case, he was, is, and always will be the best rapper ever

replies.message:
U know man, so sign this petition for him to come back to the UK!!!

Could be your last chance to see him live!!!!

Sign and share with everyone, let's make this happen!!!

 https://www.change.org/p/marshall-mathers-eminem-me-and-many-others-would-love-it-if-you-could-do-one-last-tour-in-the-uk-as-thousands-of-us-missed-your-two-night-stint-at-wembley-in-2014-we-just-want-one-last-chance-to-see-a-rap-legend-live-before-you-leave-the-game-for-goo?recruiter=350307000&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink&rp_sharecordion_checklist=control
